attributes.action: Scrap plastic bottles in meal deals and replace with a dispenser
attributes.background: 16 million RECYCLABLE plastic bottles go to landfill each day, with PET plastic taking 450 years to decompose. Supermarkets should replace bottles in meal deals with a dispenser so customers can fill their own bottles, the reduce landfill waste and the threat of plastic to marine life in the oceans.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling on shops and cafes, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/256386
